text: The Hyundai Lafesta is a sedan made by Hyundai Motor Company through its joint venture with BAIC Group called "Beijing Hyundai" since 2018 and it is positioned between the Hyundai Elantra and the Hyundai Sonata in the chinese lineup of Hyundai. == History and Features == The Hyundai Lafesta made its debut on Beijing Auto Show in 2018 and it was released in the chinese market in October of the same year it has 1.4-litre turbo 1.5-litre turbo and 1.6-litre turbo engines and it also has a electric version called Lafesta Electric that was announced in the start of December 2019 the electric version has a range of 490 km (304 mi) and a electric motor that have 135 kW (181 hp; 184 PS). == Markets == The Hyundai Lafesta is currently produced and sold exclusively in China. == References == Lafesta Category:Sedans Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Hyundai Lafesta
